items.text: in the air but safe! Slashes to get a thick outside edge that lands between backward point and square third man
right behind the line as he defends
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: flayed on the up to sweeper cover
gentle bunt into the off side for a quick single
swing and a miss outside off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: short on middle, punched off the back foot to mid-off
run away to point
gets forward and bunts past cover
slaps this to sweeper cover

items.preText: Alam Nur: "why Mash doesn't use Mahmudulla's skill I don't understand. His bowling forms in BPL was remarkable. "
items.text: makes room and flays this straight to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Stirling, no run

items.text: squared up by the length but somehow manages to defend back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Stirling, no run

items.text: defends this incoming length delivery
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Stirling, no run

items.text: check-punched into the gap at cover
stunning timing as he uses the width to punch this behind point, Tamim comes around from third man to cut that off
in the slot and punished! Clean strike over mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Stirling, FOUR runs

items.text: punched to sweeper cover
pulled wide of square leg. Didn't get proper bat on that, but spotted the opportunity for the second and made it, the fielder in the deep was caught napping
slower and fuller on off, driven to deep cover
up on his toes as he slashes this behind square to deep point
gentle bunt into the off side
pushes this down the ground for another single
pulled to fine leg, stayed low, fetched it from outside off
slashes down to square third man
makes room and looks to clobber over cover, can't pierce the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Porterfield, no run

items.text: slower ball, looks to hoick but gets a thick inside edge to long-on
items.postText: Change of commentary. Sreshth to take you through to the end of the innings
